casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Harris, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Harris, 124 Ohio St.3d 472, 2010-Ohio-722.]

*473(No. 2008-0057 Submitted January 13, 2010 Decided March 4, 2010.) William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Matthew E. Meyer, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Robert L. Tobik, Cuyahoga County Public Defender, and Paul A. Kuzmins, Assistant Public Defender, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Singleton, 124 Ohio St.3d 173, 2009-Ohio-6434, 920 N.E.2d 958.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Connor, O’Donnell, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Lundberg Stratton and Lanzinger, JJ., dissent for the reasons stated in the dissenting opinion of Lanzinger, J., in State v. Singleton.
